# bmp

A simple program written to test out some of the new features of
[SDL3](https://wiki.libsdl.org/SDL3).  It can display [BMP
images](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMP_file_format) and apply some simple
filters to them.

## Demo

https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/196578454/414877713-d6264e9b-4d0e-48dc-89cd-ecfc28217f25.mov?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3Mzk5OTQ4MzksIm5iZiI6MTczOTk5NDUzOSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xOTY1Nzg0NTQvNDE0ODc3NzEzLWQ2MjY0ZTliLTRkMGUtNDhkYy04OWNkLWVjZmMyODIxN2YyNS5tb3Y_.y7sAwpZocHETqzncsmNgzHIFmxTDNTaHEiS2hVfb21o

## Installation

Ensure that `pkg-config` and `SDL3` are installed, then run `make`.

## Resources

* [Explanation of filters and test
  images](https://cs50.harvard.edu/x/2024/psets/4/filter/more/)
